definition: father or founder of a nation/Father of the Republic (Sun Yat-sen)
country/nation/state/national/CL:個|个[ge4]
surname Guo
father

sentences.english: We celebrate Washington today as the greatest of the founding fathers.
sentences.chinese: 今日，我們尊稱華盛頓爲美國國父。

sentences.english: Dr. Sun Yat-sen has become young, and he also wears glasses.
sentences.chinese: 國父孫中山先生變年輕了，而且他還帶了一副眼鏡。
